title: Cycling Plus September issue on sale now! Subscribe and receive a free Lusso Momentum short sleeve jersey worth £70!
content:
In the September edition of Cycling Plus the team is on a bargain hunt testing four aluminium bikes from major brands between £600 and £1000. There are first rides of the Marianne Vos inspired-road bike, the Liv Langma Advanced SL Disc, and the J Laverack GRiT, plus the best in women’s kit is tested.

Cycling Plus examines how a midlife cyclist can avoid a crisis, and can we say goodbye to the bonk? Sportives are back! The team celebrate by taking part in Dartmoor’s Classic in Big Ride.

September sees the return of the Tour of Britain. Get your full event guide to all the routes with interviews and more in this issue’s special supplement.

Subscribe to Cycling Plus to receive your free gift as well as discounts and more

Value packed

The Cycling Plus team loves a bargain! Simon Withers, tested four aluminium machines between £600 and £1000 to see which one gets you the most for your money.

I can see clearly now…

Rejoice! As the sportive returns to our calendars the Cycling Plus team sent one of its most hardened riders out into the summer fog to test his legs on the formidable Dartmoor Classic.

Oh, Blighty!

After an enforced sojourn in 2020, the Tour of Britain returns with the most extensive coverage of the country yet, spanning from Penzance to Aberdeen. This supplement guide covers all you need to know.

The best on test

From shoes to helmets to clothing, the Cycling Plus female testing team have been busy scouring the women’s cycling market to find what works… and what doesn’t.
